title: Climate Change Expedition: Sustainability Adventure Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Environmental Science Terminology and Understanding of Digital Platforms
context.additional_context: A hybrid learning environment utilizing smartphone-based VR simulations and real-time collaboration tools.

learning_goals: Learners can write reports explaining the impacts of climate change and sustainability strategies.
Learners can propose practical solutions for crisis scenarios (e.g., climate disasters) presented in VR simulations.
Learners can complete three or more sustainability projects through collaborative work with peers via an adventure learning platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
